title: Brit, 31, drowns at Benidorm beach after 'going for evening swim with friends'
description: A BRIT tourist has drowned in Benidorm after reportedly jumping into the sea with two friends for an evening swim. Police confirmed the 31-year-old was found lifeless after he was swept away from t…
content:
BEACH HORROR Brit tourist, 31, drowns at popular Benidorm beach after ‘going for evening swim with friends’

A BRIT tourist has drowned in Benidorm after reportedly jumping into the sea with two friends for an evening swim.

Police confirmed the 31-year-old was found lifeless after he was swept away from the resort’s famous Levante beach.

Fortunately, his two pals made it back to the beach and were unharmed.

Police said on Saturday: “Yesterday about 8pm several British nationals were on Benidorm’s Levante Beach.

“One of them went into the sea and was unable to return to dry land.

“Several people tried to rescue him but it proved impossible."

He added: “Coastguards were mobilised but were unable to locate him. Some time later his body washed up on the shoreline.

“He was already dead at that point."

The man's death was confirmed by another local cop who said that he died in a "suspected drowning".

He added that a probe was underway but said nothing suspicious was being investigated.

A Benidorm town hall source said: “It appears this man went into the sea and couldn’t get out.

“The lifeguard service had finished for the day by the time this happened.”

More to follow... For the latest news on this story keep checking back at The Sun Online

Thesun.co.uk is your go-to destination for the best celebrity news, real-life stories, jaw-dropping pictures and must-see video.

Like us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/thesun and follow us from our main Twitter account at @TheSun.
summary: British tourist, 31, has drowned at Benidorm beach after reportedly jumping into the sea with two friends for an evening swim. The man was found lifeless after being swept away from the resort's famous Levante beach. His two friends made their way back to the beach unharmed. Police confirmed that the man died in a suspected drowning incident. An investigation is underway, but no suspicious activity is being investigated.
shortSummary: A Briton, 31, drowned at Benidorm's Levante beach after reportedly jumping into the sea with two friends, prompting a police investigation.

argos_summary: A 31‑year‑old British tourist drowned after jumping into the sea at Benidorm’s Levante Beach. He was swept away and could not be rescued; his body was later found washed up on shore. Lifeguards had finished duty, and a probe is underway with no suspicious activity reported.
